name: Marihuana
description: Known as Marijuana (dried plant parts) is a preparation of the cannabis plant that produces psychoactive effects when consumed (via smoking, vaporizing, or ingestion). The main psychoactive components of cannabis are tetrahydrocannabinol (THC) and cannabidiol (CBD). At least three species are recognized: Cannabis sativa, Cannabis indica, and Cannabis ruderalis.
effectsDesc: When a person smokes marijuana, THC quickly passes from the lungs into the bloodstream. The blood carries the chemical to the brain and other organs throughout the body. The body absorbs THC more slowly when the person eats or drinks it. In that case, they generally feel the effects after 30 minutes to 1 hour.
safetyTips: keep calm and drink plenty of water
move to a safe and relaxing location
avoid alcohol, which can exacerbate the experience
breathe and remember that the experience will pass
